relation: Called when a connection is made.
Parse the status line and headers for an HTTP request.
Called every time a header is received.
Called when all headers have been received.
Called with a list of (key, value) pairs of metadata, if metadata is available on the server.
Called with chunk of MP3 data.
textBeforeTable: See http://www.smackfu.com/stuff/programming/shoutcast.html for details on the protocol. Modes can be 'length', 'meta' and 'mp3'. Shoutcast HTTP stream. Part of twisted.protocols.shoutcast View Source View In Hierarchy t.p.s.ShoutcastClient(http.HTTPClient) : class documentation Go to the latest version of this document.
textAfterTable: Inherited from HTTPClient: Instance Variable length The length of the request body in bytes. (type: int) Instance Variable firstLine Are we waiting for the first header line? (type: bool) Method sendCommand Undocumented Method sendHeader Undocumented Method endHeaders Undocumented Method extractHeader Given a complete HTTP header, extract the field name and value and process the header. Method connectionLost Called when the connection is shut down. Method handleResponseEnd The response has been completely received. Method handleResponsePart Undocumented Method handleStatus Called when the status-line is received. Method rawDataReceived Override this for when raw data is received. Instance Variable __buffer The buffer that stores the response to the HTTP request. (type: A StringIO object.) Instance Variable _header Part or all of an HTTP request header. (type: bytes) Inherited from LineReceiver (via HTTPClient): Class Variable delimiter The line-ending delimiter to use. By default this is b'\r\n'. Class Variable MAX_LENGTH The maximum length of a line to allow (If a sent line is longer than this, the connection is dropped). Default
